data.name: Ritz
data.description: Ritz in Alameda Franca offers a lively atmosphere perfect for casual dining with friends or family, renowned for serving São Paulo's best hamburger, unique falafel salad, delightful rice balls, and traditional shrimp muqueca.
data.transcription: I'm going to give a review of the restaurant Ritz, in Alameda Franca, it's an excellent restaurant to go out with friends, to go out with family. It's a restaurant that offers good options of informal food, the specialty is a hamburger, it's given as the best hamburger in São Paulo. But there will also be options of salads, I recommend the falafel salad, which is very original. The restaurant is also very famous for the finger food, especially the rice balls. There is also a traditional Sunday dish, which is shrimp muqueca, with beiju parmesan cheese. It's a restaurant that has an excellent cost-benefit ratio. The service is young and friendly, and the place is very lively, be it for lunch or dinner.
